# Web publishing guidance

- image restrictions
- acronyms markdown

## Converting Word documents to markdown

R code for 

```
library(rmarkdown)
pandoc_convert(input = 'FILENAME.docx',
               to="markdown_mmd",
               output = "FILENAME.md", 
               options = c("--wrap=none",
                           "--reference-links",
                           "--extract-media=./images/"))

```
